scripts.name: TVTime Torrents Support
scripts.description: Quick Episode Torrent Results and Torrent Search at many Torrent Sites, Adds buttons of favorite torrent providers that populate list with episode search results and direct buttons for torrent search in providers space, in order to work requires "Allow CORS: Access-Control-Allow-Origin" addon, tested on firefox. Based on etcho "TVTime fast search episodes at many torrent sites" script.
